entities.name: detention
entities.description: Harry is in detention with Dolores Umbridge. The detention is mentioned as a punishment for not practicing Vanishing Spells.

entities.name: dolores umbridge
entities.description: Dolores Umbridge is the one who gave Harry his second detention. She is described as an 'old toad' by Harry.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character in this passage. He is in detention with Dolores Umbridge and has other commitments that he needs to attend to.

entities.name: professors mcgonagall
entities.description: Professors McGonagall, Grubbly-Plank, and Sinistra are mentioned as giving Harry and his friends more homework. They are described as professors.

entities.name: grubbly-plank
entities.description: Grubbly-Plank is one of the professors who gave Harry and his friends more homework.

entities.name: sinistra
entities.description: Sinistra is one of the professors who gave Harry and his friends more homework.

entities.name: angelina johnson
entities.description: Angelina Johnson is a Quidditch player who is not impressed by Harry's attitude towards training.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is a friend of Harry's who tries to console him after he gets into an argument with Angelina Johnson.

relationships.description: Harry is in detention with Dolores Umbridge. The detention is mentioned as a punishment for not practicing Vanishing Spells.
Harry had an argument with Angelina Johnson over his attitude towards training.
Hermione tried to console Harry after he got into an argument with Angelina Johnson.
